>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/chat-gateway/v1/conversations/{conversationId}/participants"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves all the participants that joined during the lifespan of the conversation.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"conversationId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Conversation identifier.","schema":{"type":"string","format":"string","example":"125"}},{"name":"X-8x8-Tenant","in":"header","required":false,"description":"Tenant ID, it is going to be mandatory if customer has more than one CC tenant in his organisation.","schema":{"type":"string","format":"string"},"example":"TheTenant"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
